name: Spotify Light Grey WebPlayer
description:
A skin for the Spotify WebPlayer (https://play.spotify.com)!
For all the people that don't like it too dark. ;)
additional_info:
26.11.2014
- Fixed album headers on Artist page
- Fixed wrong colors in Queue view

15.05.2014
- Styled the new Queue feature
- Small fixes (padding) here and there

12.05.2014
- Changed the checkmark's color to green and the "X" to red
- Changed the left padding in some views

08.05.2014
- Uploaded the style.
